culturalDiscovery.description: Learn about different cultures and traditions

guidelinesScreen.introDescription: Welcome to WorldFriends! Please read and accept our community guidelines.

supporter.title: Support WorldFriends
supporter.whySectionDesc: WorldFriends is a passion project built by a solo developer. Your one-time $2.99 donation helps support ongoing development and ensures that the app remains free and accessible to everyone

getSection.title: What You Get
getSection.firstBenefit: Special supporter heart badge on your profile

appInfo.convexDesc: The life changing Reactive Backend as a Service for Software Developers
appInfo.infoDesc: WorldFriends is a passion project built by a dedicated student who believes in the power of global connections. This platform brings together people from different cultures, languages, and backgrounds.

auth.signupSubTitle: Join us and start your journey

notifications.emptySubtext: You'll see notifications about friend requests, messages, and other activities here
